paper_abstract: Web Intelligence (WI)-based portal techniques (e.g. the wisdom Web, data mining, multi-agent, and data/knowledge grids) will provide a new powerful platform for Brain Sciences. New understanding and discovery of the human intelligence models in Brain Sciences (e.g. cognitive science, neuroscience, brain informatics) will yield new WI research and development. In this paper, we briefly investigate three high-impact research issues as well as present a case study, to demonstrate the potentials of Brain Informatics (BI) research from WI perspective.
paper_title: Impending brain informatics research from web intelligence perspective
